column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I had to try authentic deep dish pizza while in Chicago
column2: so I came to Lou Malnati's. This place seems to be crazy busy
column3: as I went twice and both times there were 45 minute waits to get a seat on a week night. I ended up ordering a pizza online for carryout
column4: which worked well for me. I ordered a personal-sized deep dish pizza with sausage
column6: and fresh tomatoes. The pizza was amazing
column7: so I'm glad I chose to try my first deep dish pizza here.
